text: Positano is a 1996 Italian television comedy mini series written and directed by Vittorio Sindoni. It was broadcast on Rai 1. ==Main cast== *Amanda Sandrelli as Daria *Milly Carlucci as Luisa *Duccio Giordano as Andrea *Marta Armando as Lucilla *Andrea Giordana *Lorenzo Iavarone *Angelo Infanti *Ivo Garrani *Anna Ammirati *Franco Angrisano *Carlotta Miti *Gianfranco Barra ==References== ==External links== * Category:Italian-language films Category:Italian television films
title: Positano (miniseries)
